title: $1099 -- Valentine's Day Paris Vacation
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $1099 -- Valentine's Day Paris Vacation $1099 -- Valentine's Day Paris Vacation by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - October 5, 2015 at 7:31 PM 
What could be more romantic than Paris in February? Go-Today.com is featuring four-night escapes to Paris with airfare included from just $1,099 per person. There is no book-by date, but stays are for the dates surrounding Valentine's Day. 
This deal includes: Round-trip airfare from New York City; other departure cities are available at varying rates Four nights' accommodations in Paris Taxes and fuel surcharges Daily breakfast 
How to get this deal: Visit Go-Today 's website. Travel at these rates is valid from New York City, but other departure cities are available. The offer provider hasn't listed a booking deadline. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
